item.title: Tafseer Surah Balad, Part 2: Iqtahamaa
item.description: This is post #34 in our series on Tafseer of Juz ‘Amma (click the link to see all posts in this series). The CN Tower, 150 stories high. Fa laa iqtahamaa al-aqabah. Continuing our discussion of Surah Balad, Allah (‘azza wa jal) says: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ Translation: Have We not made for him two eyes? And a tongue and two lips? And have shown him the two ways?
